body_html:
@ankitachandak, could you post the list of commands you are using to build it?

If you change just one file, building and linking should not take more than 10s.

But if you only want the LLVM IR, there is another way to do it. Run:

$ export TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=2
$ python <filename.py>         # With XLA enabled

or:

$ TF_XLA_FLAGS="--xla_cpu_llvm_cl_opts=-print-after-all" python matmul.py --xla=true

body:
@ankitachandak, could you post the list of commands you are using to build it?

If you change just one file, building and linking should not take more than 10s. 

But if you _only want the LLVM IR_, there is another way to do it. Run:
```
$ export TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=2
$ python <filename.py>         # With XLA enabled
```

or:

```
$ TF_XLA_FLAGS="--xla_cpu_llvm_cl_opts=-print-after-all" python matmul.py --xla=true
```
